notesStmt.note: Defective at the beginning and at the end. A leaf is missing after folio 192. A few leaves are damaged with loss of text.
Manuscript description based on Margoliouth, G.: Catalogue of the Hebrew and Samaritan Manuscripts in the British Museum, London 1965.

msContents.summary: A portion of Maimonides' Commentary on the Mishnah of Seder Ḳodashim, in Judeo-Arabic.

collation.p: Quires of 10 leaves each, signed with Hebrew letters both on the first and the last pages.

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Yemenite semi-cursive script of the 14th to 15th century. The writing is occasionally blotted.
